Detailed Description

Factory for create a finite state machine builder.

Example of use: 

 ...
 IFiniteStateMachineBuilder builder = FiniteStateMachineFactory.getInstance().getBuilder();
 ...

Definition at line 71 of file FiniteStateMachineFactory.java.

IFiniteStateMachineBuilder org.ofsm.FiniteStateMachineFactory.newBuilder (   )  throws Exception
 

Create new machine builder object You can redefine of creation class type.

Specify your class name in environment attribute "org.ofsm.machinebuilder" and this method will return instance of your class.

Note:
This is method pluggable and may redefined
Returns:
Finite state machine builder
Exceptions:
Exception Throws when unable to find or create class for instance
